meanings.definition: The state or quality of being unanimous.
meanings.sent1: The unanimities among the team members led to a successful project completion.
meanings.sent2: The board reached unanimities on the new policy changes after a thorough discussion.
meanings.sent3: The unanimities in taste preferences made choosing a restaurant easy for the group.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, the harmonious blend of instruments creates a beautiful unanimities.
meanings.sent5: The unanimities in their beliefs strengthened their bond as a community.

meanings.definition: Agreement by all people involved; consensus.
meanings.sent1: The unanimities reached during the meeting brought a sense of unity among the members.
meanings.sent2: The family made unanimities on vacation plans to ensure everyone's happiness.
meanings.sent3: The unanimities on the best movie to watch resulted in a fun movie night.
meanings.sent4: The unanimities in values laid a strong foundation for their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The unanimities in goals propelled the team towards success.
